Help:Node.title: General Concepts: Dancing
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Dancing
Important commands: dance, dancearm, dancecheek, dancecircle, dancedip, dancefollow, dancehop, dancejig, dancelead, dancerhythm, danceshuffle, dancesidestep, dancesweep, danceswirl, dancetwirl, dancewaltz
A variety of verbs allow a couple to consensually dance in Skotos games and Theatres.
